title: 6.5.7 Create API service layer
body:
## Parent Issue
#27 - 6.5 Chat Interface + Dashboard UI

## Objective
Create typed API service functions for chat, auth, trial.

## Services
- chatService: sendMessage, getConversations, getMessages
- authService: login, register, refresh, logout
- trialService: getStatus, extend
- documentService: upload, list, delete

## Files to Create
- `frontend/src/services/api.ts`
- `frontend/src/services/chatService.ts`
- `frontend/src/services/authService.ts`
- `frontend/src/services/trialService.ts`
- `frontend/src/services/documentService.ts`
- `frontend/src/types/*.ts`

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] All API calls typed
- [ ] Error handling consistent
- [ ] Auth token attached to requests
- [ ] Response types match backend

## Estimated Time
2.5 hours
